verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:16
verses.text: But shun profane and vain babblings: for they will increase unto more ungodliness.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:17
verses.text: And their word will eat as doth a canker: of whom is Hymeneus and Philetus;

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:18
verses.text: Who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already; and overthrow the faith of some.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:19
verses.text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.
